appetizers.name: Pinwheels
appetizers.descrip: Tortilla topped with cream cheese, shredded cheese and ham. Sliced into bite-sized rounds.

appetizers.name: Bacon Dip
appetizers.descrip: Cheese dip loaded with bacon and red bell peppers. Served with a platter of fresh tortilla chips.

coldSandwiches.name: Ham and Cheese Sandwich
coldSandwiches.descrip: A succulent ham sandwich with your choice of rye, white or whole wheat bread, your choice of american, pepperjack or provolone cheese. Lettuce and tomato on the side.

coldSandwiches.name: Turkey Sandwich
coldSandwiches.descrip: A cold turkey sandwich with your choice of rye, white or whole wheat bread, your choice of american, pepperjack or provolone cheese. Lettuce, tomato and pickle on the side.

hotSandwiches.name: Philly Cheesesteak
hotSandwiches.descrip: Sliced beef cooked to perfection on a hoagie bun with your choice of american, pepperjack or provolone cheese and sauteed onions.

hotSandwiches.name: Meatball Marinara
hotSandwiches.descrip: A thick meatball sub sandwich with marinara sauce, your choice of american, pepperjack or provolone cheese topped with oregano all on a hoagie bun.

desserts.name: Cheesecake
desserts.descrip: A creamy and smooth cheesecake on a flakey crust.

drinks.name: Soda
drinks.descrip: Your choice of any available soda.

drinks.name: Sweet Tea
drinks.descrip: A glass of cold sweet tea.
